website_summaries.verdict: This drain cleaner simultaneously clears clogs and combats odors.
pros: Provides a wonderful cleaner for drain and disposal maintenance
Consists of billions of environmentally friendly bacteria that eliminate waste on contact without harming your pipes
cons: Pricey in comparison to similar drain cleaners

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor got something very similar. A plumber gave it to him and was told that it was best to mix it with tepid water before you put it down the drain and not to do it every day for five days as the instructions say. Doing it once every other day to begin with and then monthly. I used it on a rental house with older plumbing and everything just started flowing better just after one treatment. Even the toilet seemed to flush better! I'd recommend it to everyone, it's just too bad that it's so expensive, but much less than calling a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: The sink in my bathroom would back up when I would leave the water running. This was not a major problem but I preferred to have it drain properly. I tried out this product and it opened up the drain to let the water drain properly. It worked.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I recently bought an older home with plumbing issues, one of which was stinky drains. I followed the instructions and the smell is now gone. I plan on using this monthly to keep the smell from returning. One thing though, unless I am misunderstanding something, there is no way I can get 128 applications from this. I used it for 5 consecutive days per the instructions on two bathrooms (2 shower drains, 2 toilettes, 3 sinks) and not much is left.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My toilet was clogged for a month. I tried highly toxic chemicals. An auger and tons of plunging. The directions suggested using 5 treatments and my toilet flushed perfectly after 4. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ATrujillo

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great. Well Worth the Cost.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well on an almost totally blocked bathtub drain. One thing though. After the first application, the tub was still pretty much blocked. I gave it just a couple of plunges with a plunger and it opened right up. Perhaps all the stuff was loose and just needed to be kicked free. I applied it 2 more times and the tub is working great. Yes, as others have mentioned, it is quite expensive. But, it's far cheaper than a plumber and considered all the Draino I have used over the years, (yes I know it can be bad for pipes), I think this product is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shane p. murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Easy To Use.
customer_reviews.text: The floor drains at my ice cream shop often attract drain flies due to all the sugary items being washed down them. I have been looking for something to flush the pipes and remove the food source for the flies. This product does that and much more. If you are looking for a good, easy to use product that does what it advertises, this is your product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Old house, old pipes! Was getting a offensive smell in one of our bathrooms and we tried all kinds of thing to get rid of it! Many did not work and we had some concerns that some products may be corroding our old pipes. We have a septic system and I remember reading about some product that are enzymes-based for maintenance for that system. So after purchasing DrainScrub powder from Amazon and trying it out I found that it really works! I encourage those that go this route to follow the instructions and follow the recommended maintenance schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: This product just works. Especially the smell in our disposal and laundry room drains that was not always horrible but we sure can see a difference. Had tried all the home remedies. All the slow drains run fast now. Like someone else said here a bit expensive but much less than a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but has a biological smell to it, even dry, much more pronounced when used.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, but has a distinct odor (unpleasant, but not overpowering) when dry. When used and the product is wet, it floats some, and the smell becomes markedly stronger and a bit worse. However, if you can deal with that, it does clean the drain lines for almost all sink/tub/toilet uses and seems to have removed a building clog in an elbow turn pipe I had slowly building. I now use it every couple months and have no slow-drain issues from these drains or downstream from them. I also recommend the companion products for cleaning washers and dishwashers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated Stinky Disposal Smell
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in our kitchen! We have repeatedly dealt with a stinky garbage disposal. It was replaced only 2 years ago and we continue to have issues with the smell. This product has completely eliminated the smell and the sink drains much quicker. I didn't even realize that the sink was draining slowly until using this. I highly recommend. Much cheaper than a plumber!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a slow drain I had in my kitchen. I followed the instructions letting it sit overnight and woke up to a free flowing drain. Worked just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hromatko

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this on a slow bathroom drain and have done the initial five treatments. I was tired of the harsh chemical products damaging the finish on the metal drain parts so I decided to try this. The drain is still partially clogged but is noticeably faster. I’m sure it’ll continue to improve. Sure beats the $150 the plumber wanted to clean it! I can’t think of anything negative.
customer_reviews.author: Jim V.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this drain cleaner and have used it on one drain, so far it's doing what they say it will do. Plano on getting to apply to all drains in the house. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Plumbing Issues Resolved!
customer_reviews.text: DrainScrub is an amazing product! I have had plumbing issues in my house for a few months and felt like I tried several different products before purchasing this one. None of the other products worked near as well as Drain Scrub. I used it initially to help clean out my plumbing lines and now I use it for general maintenance. I also love that it doesn't have all the harsh chemicals so I don't have to wear gloves or worry about it damaging my skin or clothes if it gets on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised even months later. Superb product. I used it on all my sinks, drains, septic tank.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Nuschler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product in both my sinks and my tubs and am very satisfied with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: This product works ok, I found that it does work for the smell, but as far as unclogging my pipes not so much. I tried using it every day for a week and unfortunately didn't notice too much of a difference in drainage in my tub. For me it's not sustainable for clogging as I feel I would have to use it at least several times a week. But if I didn't have such picky pipes it might work, even with drano I have to use pretty much monthly in my bathroom for some reason. So I intend to try again after we move since this house is the worst I've ever lived in for a clogged bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: jmmt18

customer_reviews.title: Get it now before you end up with a clog
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use. Just follow the instructions on the side. My sink just got snaked to remove a clog, and the plumber recommended I get this and use it about once a week for a few weeks and then once every month or so after that. So far, the sink has worked perfectly. The only thing I wish is that I had known about this years ago and maybe avoided the clog altogether!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mann

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for slow draining bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this product. But I've used it 9 days straight and my sink drain is moving just as slow, if not slower, than before. And now there's an odor that wasn't there before. Very disappointed. Update: I originally gave this 1 star but have bumped it up to 2 stars. My sister encouraged me to extend my trial time. So I used it for a little over 2 weeks and I put it in the toilet which has a sluggish flush. The sink never improved. But the toilet seems to be a little better. Not $50 worth of better. So I returned this for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kay Deville

customer_reviews.title: Safe, effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product worked better than anything else I've used for eliminating grease and the associated odors that build up in drains. Drain Scrub is easy to use, safe for my employees, and has the added benefit of keeping fruit flies down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of crickets
customer_reviews.text: Have had chronic problem of desert crickets coming up the two master bathroom sink drains most every night. Chronic problem for all of us here in the Palm Springs desert area. Used this for four straight days and no more crickets for the last two weeks. Will use it once weekly for a while.
customer_reviews.author: josch

customer_reviews.title: Worked Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with a old pipe system from our little used main floor bathtub. Used DrainScrub for a week without running the water. I then filled up the tub, removed the plug, and water flowed freely. Now I just need to keep apply once a week for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, our drain was clogged with microbeads of pumice and shells, non biodegradable items and the product did not work. However, when UPS repeatedly did not pickup our return, the seller was very understanding and easy to work with. We appreciated that very much.
customer_reviews.author: ong trang

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using in the kitchen sink drain for about a month. I have had no clogs whereas I was having frequent clogs prior. I will review again in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works, but my troublesome sink hasn't backed up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Zoromski

customer_reviews.title: “I’m a Believer!”
customer_reviews.text: My husband cleans our drains every 3 months and has always gotten a lot of hunk out of the pipes. I bought this product and have used it like the directions specified. He was very skeptical! Did not want me to try it! Last week when he cleaned the drains he was saying “ I don’t believe it”, even sang the “I’m a believer” song because he did not get any gunk from the pipes! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really worked when other products did not
customer_reviews.text: This really works. My kitchen sink was emitting awful odors and I tried the little scent balls and tried baking soda and vinegar and they didnt work as they used to in my old house. I did some research online and learned about these enzyme cleaners that feed off the bad stuff down there in the pipes. This works as promised. It seems expensive but you only use a little bit of it for each teatment. Also it is more earth friendly because is not harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: ozangel

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and seems to do what it is supposed to do. We did not use to unclog anything, but rather to keep drains, particularly the kitchen drain from gumming up. So far so good, but too early to tell for sure
customer_reviews.author: Vodil

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: It really works. The best part is it is easy to apply, no mask or gloves needed. Then, the really best part is my drains drain better! Thanks for making this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset

customer_reviews.title: Finally--- a true fix !
customer_reviews.text: I had a very slow drain in my downstairs bathroom sink. I used this product and it cleared up right away. The product also stopped the "gurgling" sound. I will continue to use it as indicated !
customer_reviews.author: Edward R.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So I follow the directions and applied this to a slow-moving shower drain for the 5 days. Made sure to remove any hair or any debris prior to the applications. By day 3 the clog had actually gotten worse in the water stopped flowing whatsoever. By day five I had standing water that would not drain in my bathtub. This product does not do as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Adelyn

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My old cast iron pipes were draining very slowly and would clog and back up from time to time causing the basement toilet to gurgle. Maybe from 70 years of kitchen sink waste building up in the pipe. Used this product as directed and three weeks later the pipes continue to flow with no problems. Thought $50 for a 2lb tub was a little steep but it’s way cheaper than having it snaked professionally. So far I am sold. Will continue to throw a dose in once a month for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Cletus

customer_reviews.title: Great grease remover
customer_reviews.text: This product was very effective in removing grease buildup in my kitchen and main drain. I am using it monthly to prevent future build up, along with wiping out anything with oil or grease before washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: No worries flushing anymore
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again. I have not had the smell from my sewer pump since the first treatment.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieDoll

customer_reviews.title: Good as it gets....
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe, but it works better than any harsh chemical based product I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME product! Didn't expect it to work the way it did! 100% product!
customer_reviews.author: Pito

customer_reviews.title: Total rip off
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money, the container states "up to 128 treatments", I was lucky to get 70. I'm going back to Bio Clean which correctly states "up to 100 treatments" and I got every bit that much. By the way, these products are the same price, no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: bob coscarelli

customer_reviews.title: Potent Enough to Clear a Persistent Clog ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a few initial doses solved a chronic backup in our bathroom sink. Now we apply it weekly to prevent any recurring build-up. Safe and super simple to mix and apply ... definitely one of more economical and less invasive drain remedies out there.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H Wells

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is ridiculously expensive but it’s claim to not hurt pipes over road my common sense -COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY DID NOT DO A THING ... I’ve got 3/4 a bottle anyone can have for free - SMH
customer_reviews.author: Angie Purwin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I live on the back house of a property and the plumbing is terrible. Unavoidable food and grease from dishwashing had been clogging the pipes because it doesn't flow correctly to the sewer. I've used this product in every drain in the house and it seems to have had a noticeable impact. We haven't had to have the pipes flushed in quite a while like we used to.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our plumber! Used as directed & monthly maintenance too. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: I've used other drain cleaners for my septic system and they haven't worked. With 3 boys our tub drain gets gunked up easily and after trying others that didn't work I have this product a shot and it did the trick. Several months of slow draining tub was transformed by this product sitting in the pipes those 7 hours. Thankful!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyMack

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, no toxic chemical smells
customer_reviews.text: On product re-order, use to keep tub and sink drains in apartment working well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: All Clean
customer_reviews.text: This worked well, you do have to use it for 5 days straight, but it's great to know that it cleans my drains with no harmful chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as expected
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to keep the drains from backing up - our plumber suggested this product - we use once a month to try to keep them running free - so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be easy to use; however, the ‘crystal ‘ enzymes did not dissolve. My pipes did not clear. For me it was a waste of money and I would not purchase again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works but not as well as other brands.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the convenience and clarity of the product however it didn't work as well as other enzyme brands I have used in the past. I had a very stubborn slow drain. I treated it daily, as instructed, for a week with no change. In the end I went with a chemical cleaner to clear the drain before guests arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. Second time I've used it, happy with the results. I've tried a few other similar products from local stores, but they were all either slower, or did nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on our toilet!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff saved our plumbing lives. Our toilet has been a constant issue since we bought our house. No matter how small the toilet paper was or how thin it was it would still clog. We use this as a maintenance not only for toilets but sinks and shower drains too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison O.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, but need to keep up the process to be sure. We tried one week in all drains and it seemed to help but we will see if monthly treatments will get things flowing even more smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E Platter

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! My drains have never flowed so well and good for the environment as well. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in Addison

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a plumber and I've been using it for the past 3 plus years. It certainly seems to work! Always use it over night as directed and the results have been excellent drainage where in the past we would have to call in a plumber to unclog the kitchen drain. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you need clean and odorless drain pipes, this is the product. Just follow instructions complemented with common sense!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Martinez SR

customer_reviews.title: It ok not the best
customer_reviews.text: Did like instructions said and it didnt really help my septic tank and my toilet was flushing really slow and backed up and it didnt help it at if any maybe 2%
customer_reviews.author: Brad 672

customer_reviews.title: Made clog worse
customer_reviews.text: My sink was slightly draining, took like 30 mins to drain, before applying this product. My sink is now fully clogged and hasn’t drained in 42 hours since applying this product 2 times. I had high hopes it would work but not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Great product. I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I needed to unclog my drains and a Plummer suggested using this at night to let it sit and eat away at the sludge in my pipes. Used this 5 nights in a row and my pipes seem to be draining great without any of my pipes backing up especially my floor drain. I would recommend to anyone to clean out their pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good to have for maintaining your toilet and sink from getting clogged
customer_reviews.author: Mommy4

customer_reviews.title: COSTLY MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: DONOT believe the money back guarantee. All they do is send you more AND charge you agin. Total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Herzog-Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: All around good product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great deodorizing drains. I found that it works slowly, but I appreciate that it is environmentally safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use warm water means hot water
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but didnt mix very easily, it left grainy black residue behind after pouring it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rice

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment building on the 15th floor and our property manager doesn't let us use any harsh chemicals in the drain like Drano. He recommended that we try a bacteria/enzyme drain cleaner. I mixed one scoop in warm water and the next morning the drain was back flowing!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions exactly as written. Drain is still slow, maybe even slower. Disappointed, but not surprised - anything that sounds too good to be true usually is. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions - It works
customer_reviews.text: I have old convenience store. I snaked the drains used this as instructed and it worked. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: An ounce of prevention
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, recommended by my plumber for monthly maintenance, this tub will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Copps

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We were having washer drain issues for a long long time and went through many products but once we found this.... It was amazing
customer_reviews.author: Janel Byron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I cant say if I like or dislike yet as this product takes time to work. Shipping was quick and so far, so good.....
customer_reviews.author: HeatherL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic odor remover
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly effective in safely removing drain odors. It is simple to use, easy to pour down the drain, and highly cost-effective. Our home is > 30 years old, and a shower drain had begun to emit a foul odor. Normal store-bought cleaning products (shower soap scum removers, etc.) simply did not eliminate the odor. Initial application of this product (1X/day for 5 days) completely removed the odor and left us with an odorless bathroom. Since it is based on enzyme action (not highly caustic lye), it is much much safer around pets and children. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was rather disappointing, especially for how much it costs. Maybe I was expecting too much. I did use the product as directed, but my kitchen drain is still slow to drain. The upside is that it smells a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Wish it did better... (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: Update: So I have been contacted by the seller and trying a few different things to help me solve my problem. So I am giving them another star for reaching out since they didn’t have to and are wanting to go the extra mile. Original review: So I have been using it for a week and it’s not been really that effective... I expected more results based on the reviews, but unfortunately this product doesn’t seem to work for everyone...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used for the drain in our bathroom tub/shower. Worked well and easy to use. Instructions are easy to follow. I recommend this product for unclogging and cleaning your drains. It works!!
customer_reviews.author: FredB

customer_reviews.title: Still have a slow drain
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions exactly, but my bathroom drain is still slow. I think it helped a little, but I guess I'm just going to have to get a snake tool to really clear it out. What's puzzling is that the plumbing in this particular sink is only a few years old...the other sink in that bathroom drains well! Disappointed this product didn't work as well as I'd hoped, especially since it wasn't cheap!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lund

customer_reviews.title: DrainScrub Powder Enzyme Drain Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Used it for more than a year for a house sewer - every month, according to the instructions. After I started to use it, I had to call the sewer more often than usual (about 3-4 times a year). And each time problems started right after the next use of DrainScrub. I had to stop using it and for half a year problem dispersed. I can not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the problem with drain flies. Drains were not clogged yet drain flies were present. After treatment recommended on the container it seems drain flies are gone. I did not like that it was difficult to pour partially dissolved powder out from the container. My solution was - mix powder in 1/2 of the recommended water amount and than keep adding a little at the time until the rest of the powder was gone. Otherwise, the product is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! I was especially pleased with the way it cleaned the water fountain in my backyard! One scoop full, covered and ran the fountain for 12 hours, and I’ve never seen it looks so clean and the water is so clear!
customer_reviews.author: Sharman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I highly recommend it to clean smelly drains.
customer_reviews.author: PatSab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my home. Will continue to use on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Gammon

customer_reviews.title: Major clog
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of different drain cleaners that did not work. Your product probably works great for simply clogs. But my clog is under cover in the cement wall. So I guess I have to do some wall demolition now. Again ! Thank You for the use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: gregory sawicki

customer_reviews.title: It works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well for all my drains. I did follow directions and start on the bottom floor.
customer_reviews.author: kbshopper

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my bathroom to see if I could get the nasty smell from my bathroom sink. I used if for a week per the instructions. After only the second time I think it cleaned the drain. My only recommendation is that this is a pretty big container.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Did not clear my partially clogged toilet
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions carefully but the scrub did not clear the clog that was partially blocking my toilet. I repeated the treatment several times over several weeks. I contacted the company for support but they did not answer my email. I finally returned the remaining Drain Scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Berndt

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and helped clean a slow drain in the kitchen. I have used it on multiple drains in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DrainScrub eats your clogs, not a hole in your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I had a toilet that was clogged. Using DrainScrub as directed-five daily applications to start-unclogged the toilet. There is plenty of powder for multiple application, making this a cost effective solution.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: DrainScrub Powder Enzyme Drain Cleaner and Septic Treatment
customer_reviews.text: USED ON ALL DRAINS IN HOUSE ONE TIME WILL CONTINUE USING
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok...
customer_reviews.text: It works when you don’t have a lot of grease for your kitchen and use regularly. The cost is a bit too high though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Confused on the 5 star reviews
customer_reviews.text: This stuff did not work. I don’t understand the 5 star reviews on this at all.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep our kitchen drains clean and flowing.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cleveland-Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Not. A. Fan.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me! I had 2 bathroom sinks clogged - one badly so, and the other just a bit slow. I used about 1/2 of the container (according to directions) over several days - didn't do a thing to help!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used this as directed on some slow running drains in my home. All are now flowing freely and I will now do the treatment monthly as recommended. Would and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jleisses

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order and I use it faithfully one a month. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Give it 5 days it'll work
customer_reviews.text: It did it's job, after the 5 day treatment my drains don't clog anymore. I'll definitely be using this to maintain and treat my pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Vox

customer_reviews.title: The clog is gone!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. It just made this big whoosh sound and the clog was gone!
customer_reviews.author: JoMac

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work like a charm. My house and drains are old and the tub has a long level run before heading down. It's working much better. Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to help our almost 40 year old drains as regular cleaning and lemon juice were no longer doing the job. The hardest part was pulling out the disgusting hair clogs. The easiest part was putting the product in the drains. Have been using the cleaner for almost a month now and am very pleased with the results. The maintenance dose should be easy to keep up.
customer_reviews.author: NomDePlume

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months it appears to be working very well.
customer_reviews.author: kspata4

customer_reviews.title: This Worsened my Drain Clog
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this got so many 5-star ratings. I'd love to return it as it made my drains worse - with just a little bit each day for 3 days. I used Drain Care in the past and that worked okay. I was trying to go the 'natural' route, but wne my drain slowed considerably with this stuff I went out and bought liquid plumber - which opened it wide up.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed...DOA. Tried product per instructions for 5 straight days with no positive results. Then tried adding more of this product for 3 more days still no result. Had to call plumber to unclog. The product did not even help to increase the flow of waste water and this was the most disappointing aspect of this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.
